title: Installation issue: py-pycairo
body:
Installation of  `py-pycairo` creates weird directory named `""` (quotes quotes).

### Steps to reproduce the issue

```console
$ spack install py-pycairo@1.18.1
$ ls /cvmfs/sw.hsf.org/sft-spack/linux-centos7-haswell/gcc-8.3.0/py-pycairo-1.18.1-uslltv7ca6acskilahdf7v2jgzrgtim4/ -l
total 0
drwxr-sr-x. 4 sftnight sf 44 Mar 12 21:28 ""
drwxr-sr-x. 4 sftnight sf 48 Mar 12 21:28 lib```
```

### Information on your system

* **Spack:** 0.16.1-1650-1492461
* **Python:** 3.6.8
* **Platform:** linux-centos7-haswell
* **Concretizer:** original


### Additional information

Build logs: https://gist.github.com/iarspider/40d08948ac0f904407a80bca973dc0d4

Possibly related to or the same as #22108 

Pinging maintainer @adamjstewart 

### General information

<!-- These boxes can be checked by replacing [ ] with [x] or by clicking them after submitting the issue. -->
- [x] I have run `spack debug report` and reported the version of Spack/Python/Platform
- [x] I have run `spack maintainers <name-of-the-package>` and @mentioned any maintainers
- [x] I have uploaded the build log and environment files
- [x] I have searched the issues of this repo and believe this is not a duplicate
